name: web-framework
description: A rapid frontend ['framework', 'wrapper', 'workflow'] for web projects that utilises NPM as a build tool.

scripts.assets: npm run css:build && npm run js:build
scripts.minify: npm run minify:css && npm run minify:images && npm run minify:js
scripts.js:all: npm run build:common && npm run build:dev
scripts.sprite: sprity create src/dist/images/icons/sprite/ src/dist/images/icons/png/*.png -c ../images/icons/ -s ../../../css/scss/site/_sprites.scss -p sass -n sprite --prefix css-sprite --orientation horizontal --background '#FFFFFF' --margin '2' -d 2:192
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch --git-tag-version=false && bower version patch
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor --git-tag-version=false && bower version minor
scripts.version:major: npm version major --git-tag-version=false && bower version major
